# Allow major search engines
User-agent: Googlebot
Disallow:

User-agent: Bingbot
Disallow:

User-agent: Slurp
Disallow:

User-agent: DuckDuckBot
Disallow:

User-agent: Baiduspider
Disallow:

User-agent: YandexBot
Disallow:

User-agent: EcosiaBot
Disallow:

User-agent: MojeekBot
Disallow:

# Allow the Wayback Machine (archive.org)
User-agent: ia_archiver
Disallow:

# Disallow AI bots and scrapers
User-agent: ChatGPT-User
Disallow: /

User-agent: OpenAI
Disallow: /

User-agent: Google-Extended
Disallow: /

User-agent: GPTBot
Disallow: /

User-agent: CCBot
Disallow: /

User-agent: Claude
Disallow: /

User-agent: Bard
Disallow: /

# Block all other crawlers by default
User-agent: *
Disallow: /



User-agent: *
Disallow: /projects/deco-deco/

Sitemap: https://tinypond.studio/sitemap.xml
